item.title: Cynthia add a quote by 'I Know It's Over' -The Smiths
item.description: "It's so easy to laugh It's so easy to hate It takes strength to be gentle and kind " -- 'I Know It's Over' -The Smiths

item.title: Cynthia add a quote by The Dalai Lama
item.description: "Every day, think as you wake up, today I am fortunate to be alive, I have a precious human life, I am not going to waste it. I am going to use all my energies to develop myself, to expand my heart out to others; to achieve enlightenment for the benefit of all beings. I am going to have kind thoughts towards others, I am not going to get angry or think badly about others. I am going to benefit others as much as I can." -- The Dalai Lama

item.title: Cynthia add a quote by Elie Wiesel
item.description: "The opposite of love is not hate, it's indifference. The opposite of art is not ugliness, it's indifference. The opposite of faith is not heresy, it's indifference. And the opposite of life is not death, it's indifference." -- Elie Wiesel
